<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.InstanceUtils</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>InstanceUtils</name> <script><![CDATA[var InstanceUtils = Class.create(); InstanceUtils.prototype = { initialize: function() { }, isProduction: function() { var name = gs.getProperty('instance_name'); return !(name.includes('test') || name.includes('pilot') || name.includes('dev')); },
type: 'InstanceUtils' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-01 19:05:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>870028272f040110d8a4d5f62799b6b9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>InstanceUtils</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_870028272f040110d8a4d5f62799b6b9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-01 19:10:30</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>302</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
